titles.title: A bill to authorize a project to demonstrate the feasibility of voting by telephone.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5533-5534)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 5/5/1993--Introduced. Directs the Federal Election Commission to make a grant to a specified consortium for a project to demonstrate the feasibility of telephone voting. Authorizes appropriations
